input_text:
Job Title: Payroll Specialist

Location: Sarasota, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Are you looking for a rewarding career that coincides with the standards you see in your community and neighborhood? Then join the team of the Sarasota Clerk of the Circuit Court and County Comptroller's office, where providing exemplary service to our community is essential to fulfilling our mission.
We are looking for a detail-oriented professional to grow our team of Internal Auditor and Investigators. The candidate we seek anticipates growing their career in a fast-paced, expanding environment. The position plays a vital role not only in protecting the assets of the County but also in auditing guardianships, further contributing toward protecting those who are the most vulnerable in our community.
Excellent benefits, including participating in a Florida Retirement Plan and medical, dental, and vision plans, and tuition reimbursement, are just some of the offerings available. The minimum starting pay is $49,889 annually. Starting salary is commensurate with the candidate’s experience and qualifications, up to $62,656.
A bachelor’s degree from an accredited college or university in Accounting or related field is required. One to three years of experience is preferred in Accounting, Auditing, or Government Finance; however, candidates with a self-proclaimed interest in developing their audit skills will also be considered. Proficiency in Excel and Word is important, but the position provides opportunities to learn Teammate, and audit maintenance system, and Benchmark, a court docket database that is used throughout the state of Florida.
This opportunity affords the individual scheduled continuing education to obtain meaningful Certifications as a Certified Inspector General Auditor (CIGA), a Certified Inspector General Investigator (CIGI), or a Certified Fraud Examiner (CFE).
Be a part of a growing team of Internal Audit professionals for Sarasota County and help maintain the accomplishments already gained through service to the County and the community while gaining critical knowledge to utilize toward future achievements.
The Sarasota Clerk of the Circuit Court and County Comptroller is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer.

Experience Level (if available): Associate

output_json.title: Payroll Specialist
output_json.summary: Join the team of the Sarasota Clerk of the Circuit Court and County Comptroller's office as a detail-oriented professional in a fast-paced, expanding environment.
job_responsibilities: Growing the team of Internal Auditor and Investigators
Contributing to protecting the assets of the County
Protecting the most vulnerable in the community
Providing excellent benefits including Florida Retirement Plan, medical, dental, vision plans, and tuition reimbursement
Starting salary commensurate with experience and qualifications
Opportunities to learn Teammate, audit maintenance system, and Benchmark
